00067     class FactoryException :public Exception {
00068     public:
00070       virtual ~FactoryException() throw() =0;
00071     protected:
00078       FactoryException(std::string const &msg) throw() 
00079        :Exception(msg) {}
00080     }; // class TREX::utils::FactoryException

00196     template< class AbstractProduct, class Id, class ConsArg,
00197              class ProductRef = AbstractProduct *,
00198              class IdComp = std::less<Id> >
00199     class Factory :boost::noncopyable {
00200     public:
00202       typedef Id              producer_id;
00204       typedef typename boost::call_traits<producer_id>::param_type id_param;
00206       typedef AbstractProduct product_type;
00208       typedef ProductRef      returned_type;
00209                      
00217       void getIds(std::list<Id> &ids) const;
00218       
00230       class producer: boost::noncopyable {
00231       public:
00237        typedef typename boost::call_traits<ConsArg>::param_type argument_type;
00242        typedef ProductRef result_type;
00243                             
00257        result_type operator()(argument_type arg) const {
00258          return produce(arg);
00259        }
00260                             
00261        void notify() {
00262          declareMe();
00263        }
00264 
00269        Id const &getId() const {
00270          return m_type;
00271        }
00272                             
00273       protected:
00284        virtual result_type produce(argument_type arg) const =0;
00285                             
00293        producer(id_param id)
00294          :m_type(id) {}
00295                             
00308        void declareMe() const {
00309          // std::cerr<<m_factory.operator->()<<".add("<<m_type<<")"<<std::endl;
00310          m_factory->add(this);
00311        }
00312                             
00319        virtual ~producer() {
00320          // std::cerr<<m_factory.operator->()<<".remove("<<m_type<<")"<<std::endl;
00321          m_factory->remove(this);
00322        }
00323                             
00324       private:
00325                             
00326        Id const              m_type;    
00327        SingletonUse<Factory> m_factory; 
00328                             
00338        producer();
00339       }; // class TREX::utils::Factory<>::producer
00340                      
00362       template<class Product>
00363       class declare :public producer {
00364       public:
00379        declare(id_param id) 
00380          :producer(id) {
00381          producer::notify();
00382        }
00383 
00384 
00389        virtual ~declare() {}
00390                             
00391       private:
00392        typename producer::result_type produce(typename producer::argument_type arg) 
00393          const {
00394          typename producer::result_type ret(new Product(arg));
00395          return ret;
00396        }
00397                             
00403        BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((boost::is_convertible<Product *,
00404                                              AbstractProduct *>::value));
00405                             
00406       }; // class TREX::utils::Factory<>::declare<>
00407                      
00424       producer const &get(id_param id) const;
00425       producer const &operator[](id_param id) const {
00426        return get(id);
00427       }
00437       bool exists(id_param id) const; 
00438                      
00439     private:
00441       Factory() {}
00442       
00444       ~Factory() {}
00445                      
00446       typedef std::map<Id, producer const *, IdComp> catalog_type; 
00447       
00462       void add(producer const *prod);
00463       
00473       void remove(producer const *prod);
00474       
00480       catalog_type m_producers;
00481                      
00482       friend class producer;
00483       friend class SingletonWrapper<Factory>;
00484     }; // class TREX::utils::Factory<>
